I agree that Miss Fortune is in a fairly healthy state, but no matter what you guys try... Make It Rain will never be great or even subpar. The ability stuns her for like .25-.30 seconds, which is nasty. The ability itself is easy to step out of, because the radius isn't even significant especially considering its high mana cost. I saw you guys said the slow is getting increased at low ranks, but it only slows you for 0.25 seconds anyway so when someone easily steps out of it, especially with the vast amounts of mobility champions have access to... it doesn't matter.

My suggestion would be removing the mini-stun it applies to Miss Fortune, and removing the damage in favor of applying Impure Shots stacks ( as well as the damage of it, itself ). It'd make more sense in conjunction with her kit, as well as compliment her play style as an aoe-styled adc. It'd be like one of those expensive, delicious icings to the cake for her Q, her W and her R.

As it stands already, her kit already revolves around Impure Shot stacks but there's just not enough access to it other than auto attacking and ulting, which does a small amount of damage unless you can stack up Impure Shots on champions ( which it is rare to stack it up against MULTIPLE champions).

Riot, I have played over 500+ games with Miss Fortune over the past 5+ years.
MF has ALWAYS been one of my favorite champions, but the weak points in her kit have always felt like her E was lackluster due to the small radius, awkward cast animation / cast time as opposed to other ADC's who have an escape built in that they can use mid-kite or mid-fight inbetween attacks.  The unchanged E might preserve her theme, but it doesn't help her fragile gameplay which revolves around teammates dedicated to protecting her in fights.

As for the W... removing grievous wounds, really?
This is one of MF's early dueling caveats as a good MF can calculate how much a heal reduction will restore enemy champions mid-skirmish and come out on top!

But instead... you chose to go with W triggering her passive.

So let's talk use-cases here, the following is a list of things on live, right now that would nullify MF's passive and make her easier to delete.

Single Target DoT's:
- Brand Blaze
- Caitlyn Yordle Snap Trap
- Cassiopeia Noxius Blast
- Darius Hemmorage
- Fizz Seastone Trident
- Gangplank Grog Soasked Blade
- Malzahar Malefic Visions
- Mordekaiser Children of the Grave
- Nautilus Titan's Wrath
- Nidalee Bushwhack
- Singed Poison Trail
- Swain Torment
- Talon Noxian Diplomacy
- Teemo Toxic Shot & Noxious Trap
- Tristana Explosive Shot
- Trundles Subjugate
- Twitch Deadly Venom
- Udyr Tiger Stance
- Urgot Noxian Corrosive Charge

[This part is sketchy because the passive is defined as:  [New] Strut now has increased scaling based on level, and only falls off when Miss Fortune takes direct, non-periodic damage."

...If those are single target, DIRECT DoT's... would they not remove her passive?

PLEASE CLARIFY >.<

Don't forget about these:
- Red Buff
- Gift of the Toadstool / Gromp
- Liandry's on any champion with magic damage sources
- Cinderhulk / Sunfire Cape

AoE Dots:
- Anivia Glacial Storm
- Cassiopeia Miasma
- Corki Valkyrie
- Gangplank Cannon Barrage
- Katarina Death Lotus
- Malzahar Null Zone
- Morgana Tormented Soil
- Nasus Spirit Fire
- Pantheon Heartseeker Strike
- Rumble Equalizer
- Shyvana Burnout via Dragons Descent
- Viktor Chaos Storm
- Wukong Cyclone
- Rammus Tremors

MF Passive is supposed to ignore the above-mentioned and retain a MS speed bonus?
Please clarify, because on one hand this sounds like it can be useful but its not an escape per se like Vayne, Lucian, Graves, Corki, Sivir, Kallista, Tristana, Draven, Caitlyn, Ezreal, Quinn, Teemo, and Twitch have.

The other ADC's not listed (Ashe, Varus, Jinx, Kog'Maw) have very strong CC capabilities, stun/root/slow's.  Whereas MF has a small AOE 'slow' and as others have stated is difficult to make use of effectively unless they are rolling AP.

RITO PLZ... reconsider removing the grievous wounds :(

FIX HER E instead!  
Maybe make it so she can cast it without having to stop (would improve kiting ability), or improve the area to roughly the size of Anivia's Glacial Storm, or change it from magic damage and have it scale with AD so that it's a relevant DPS ability to offset the animation / cast time!

PLZ DON'T break one of my favorite champions >.<

- MF Enthusiast

I am sorry, but removing the Grievous Wound from MF's Impure Shots is one of the worst updates I've seen. MF was the only ADC who could actually prevent opponents from healing so much in a sustain lane like Nid+Taric. Now that GW has been removed, there is no way outside of Ignite for an AD champion to lessen the healing affects on their targets. That was one of MF's best things. And now you've destroyed her niche.

At least put the Grievous Wounds back on her with Make it Rain so that it's not as lousy an ability as it is. I mean, she has to just _sit there and channel it_ only for it to slow an enemy _just_ long enough for the slow to time out **as she finishes channeling.** Make that ability more than just a waste of mana with low damage and usability.

Sorry, RIOT. I usually support the choices you make with your reworks. But this is just absolutely ridiculous.

I'm not an MF main, so I may not know what I'm talking about, but I always thought, bullet time aside, how her impure shots worked _was_ core to her identity.  The grievous wounds wasn't hidden.  It was part of the reason her enemies couldn't rely as effectively on lifesteal in a duel and why she was particularly useful against certain champions.  The only way in which grievous wounds was hidden was that almost nothing actually grants grievous wounds anymore, which makes it feel more like it's simply an ability Riot is trying to phase out of League for the sake of "clarity."

The rest of her update matches this, not that I dislike the other changes.  But what's clear and consistent in current League: (and I hate that I'm saying this because I'm not someone who's complained about its creep) Mobility.  So how do you changer her, by maker her the...er...a mobile ADC, and that might be a problem because not only are so many other ADCs mobile, but the mobile ones are far more mobile than her even with this tweak.  This means her mobility will mostly give her an edge against non-mobile ADCs and ADCs not laning with healing or CC using supports or using significant lifesteal in helping her chase them down.  I honestly don't know how many match-ups that's representative of, but it seems like a small number.

This is because while it will help her keep up, I don't know that it'll be enough to help her get away when being pursued more than her current kit will against today's mobile champs and plain ol' CC, and it certainly won't help her win fights.  I honestly kind of feel like she could have gotten some tweaks to strut to help make her mobile just as a QoL against a more mobile champion set that's emerged.  This is especially true because the core identity you're enforcing of a lot of bullets just isn't powered to hit hard enough to do real damage in mid to late game, so now in exchange for her mobility, you're taken away that much more relevance to her presence in those phases.

That said, I really like the idea of the buffs she's gotten.  They just don't fee like a fair trade for what she's lost.  Her updated art looks really nice, though.
